table_caption: Connections identified using neurogranin × ∆Time as a predictor for longitudinal changes in WaCSMD (multiple comparisons corrected using Bonferroni at 0.05) sorted by corresponding p-values (column 1–3), and the correlation between simple MD changes and neurogranin × ∆Time on the identified connections (column 4). Two ROIs (i.e., ROI 1 and ROI 2) represent one connection and the ROI indices corresponds to their labels in the IIT template.
table_foot: ctx: cortex, lh: left hemisphere, rh: right hemisphere, S: sulcus, G: gyrus, sup: superior, inf: inferior, post: posterior, frontomargin: frontomarginal, pariet: parietal, tran/transv: transverse, frontopol: frontopolar.
